title: Thursday Post Show (3-18-21)
itunes:title: Thursday Post Show (3-18-21)
description:
Bobby addressed the changes to the post show and how he has different plans for it since it’s now its own podcast. Bobby on the NCAA bracket tonight and how he is going to pick Arkansas. We each give our picks on who we think will win. Amy talks about how she felt some agism already after turning 40. Bobby on how our industry keeps us younger.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
